00083 class MarkerExperimentReport : public ExperimentReport
00084 {
00085 public:
00086 
00087 
00088   virtual bool         close(bool abort = false);
00089   virtual bool         generate(class RunTimeEnvironment & rte,
00090                                 class TranslationTableModel & ttm,
00091                                 std::map<std::string, ExperimentResults*> &er);
00092 
00093   std::string          getMarkerReportName(const class RunTimeEnvironment & rte) ;
00094   virtual std::string  name() {
00095     return std::string("MarkerExperimentReport");
00096   }
00097   void                 open(const class RunTimeEnvironment & rte);
00098   virtual ExperimentReportTypeEnum report_type() {
00099     return MARKER;
00100   }
00101 
00102   MarkerExperimentReport() {
00103     m_open_called = false;
00104   }
